--- title: Post With Code author: Jie Wang date: '2022-08-02' categories: - news - code - analysis image: image.jpg --- Practice based on [pandas intro](https://github.com/Tanu-N-Prabhu/Python/blob/master/Pandas/Pandas_DataFrame.ipynb) # Creating a pandas DataFrame ::: {.cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd data = {"Name": ["a", "b", "c", "d"], "Age": [24, 23, 22, 19]} data df = pd.DataFrame(data) df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ```{=html}
Name Age
0 a 24
1 b 23
2 c 22
3 d 19
``` ::: ::: # Selecting a Column ::: {.cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} df["Name"] df[["Name"]] # the difference? ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ```{=html}
Name
0 a
1 b
2 c
3 d
``` ::: ::: # Selecting a Row ::: {.cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} df.loc[1] df.iloc[1] ?df.iloc ``` ::: # Data Selection, addition ::: {.cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} # ?df.insert df.insert(1, "Sex", "F") del df["Sex"] df.insert(2, "Sex", "M") df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ```{=html}
Name Age Sex
0 a 24 M
1 b 23 M
2 c 22 M
3 d 19 M
``` ::: ::: # Working with missing data ::: {.cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} import numpy as np data = {"Name": ['A', np.nan], "Age": [23, np.nan]} df = pd.DataFrame(data) df df.isnull() df.fillna(0) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5} ```{=html}
Name Age
0 A 23.0
1 0 0.0
``` ::: ::: :::{.callout-note} use `exit` instead of `exit()` to exit the RStudio Python REPL :::
